
# Roadmap — Phoenix Agentic Website Frontend (Public)

## Current status

- Repository initialized with planning docs and agent prompt.
- Next milestone is implementation scaffold with secure defaults.

## Phase summary

| Phase | Scope | Status |
|------|-------|--------|
| Phase 0 | Repo/docs/prompt scaffolding | ✅ Complete |
| Phase 1 | App scaffold + CI + security headers | Upcoming |
| Phase 2 | Public pages (home, pricing, demos, reviews, blog, docs, donate) | Upcoming |
| Phase 3 | Entra auth UX + account dashboard shell | Upcoming |
| Phase 4 | Backend API integration for account/billing/downloads | Upcoming |
| Phase 5 | Accessibility, SEO, and release hardening | Upcoming |

## Working principles

1. Keep frontend public-safe.
2. Keep billing/account authority in private backend.
3. Ship in small, testable increments.
